price: 70. Such is the Bounty from Allâh, and Allâh is Sufficient as All-Knower.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
